Package projectclasses

Class ProviderController

java.lang.Object
projectclasses.ProviderController
public class ProviderController extends Object
The provider controller allows the user to primarily BillChocAn as well as supporting validating and getting the name of a member.
Author:
Zack Michaels

  • Constructor Details

    • ProviderController

      public ProviderController(ArrayList<Member> memberList, ArrayList<Provider> providerList)
      Provider Controller constructor that stores up-to-date data of the system.
      Parameters:
      memberList - and providerList are the ArrayLists passed that will be stored to the Provider Controller that will be referenced later

  • Method Details

    • validateMember

      public String validateMember(int id)
      Validates Member.
      Parameters:
      id - that is being checked
      Returns:
      Returns Valid Member if found, else Invalid Member as a string

    • getMemName

      public String getMemName(int id)
      Returns member name.
      Parameters:
      id - that is being used to return corresponding name
      Returns:
      Returns the name corresponding to the entered ID as a string

    • billChocAn

      public boolean billChocAn(String dos, int serviceCode, int memNum, int provNum, ArrayList<ServiceRecords> servRec, Provider prov)
      BillChocAn allows the provider to bill ChocAn by selecting the appropriate service code and using a valid member.
      Parameters:
      dos - Provider-entered Date of service, serviceCode used, member #, provider #, list of service records, and the provider object being used
      Returns:
      Returns true if BillChocAn process was successful, else false if cancelled
